document_data.name: Orielen
document_data.mainbody: '''Orielen''', also spelled '''Orielden''', was a [[human]] [[hexblade]] and a Knight of Shar who served the [[Shar|Dark Lady]]'s temple, the [[House of Night]], in [[Shadowdale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: As part of his duties as the House of Night's head guardsman, Orielen kept a watchful eye over the two [[mezzoloth]]s that stood as sentinels at the temple's front entrance.
document_data.Relationships: Orielen served under High Priestess [[Esvele Greycastle]]. He led a small number of guardsmen, and was aided in his duties by two acolytes of the [[Sharran]] church, [[Telkin]] and [[Jorra]].
document_data.History: He was involved in the [[Zhent]] invasion of [[Shadowdale]] in the {{YearlinkName|1375}}.
